tiles.title: You are in the wood
tiles.text: The night has come, and the forest looks gloomy, as you go deeper between the trees. Ashes of a fire still smoke.

tiles.title: You are on the north-east side of the forest

tasks.title: Pick the Longbow
tasks.description: Suddenly, you hear a voice from the forest.. it says that you must find a longbow.

tiles.title: You are south-west in the heart the forest
tiles.text: The deeper you go in the wood, the cooler is the air. Misty fog surrounds leafs and logs, while you have strange feelings.

creatures.name: Loic the Orc
creatures.description: an orc. He looks angry. He holds a crossbow, aimed at you.

tiles.title: You are south-east of the forest
tiles.text: This forest is a labyrinth, a kind of a maze. A nightowl spread its wings on a cedar tree. If you listen carefully, you can hear a flow of waters, probably a river.
